job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers, to:
     * Achieve uptime >99.99%.
     * Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters.
     * Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation.
     * Operate and improve our automation tooling.
     * Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
     * Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes.
     * Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide., * A fair salary.
     * A yearly bonus based on yours and the company's performance.
     * 25 days of holiday leave
     * Hybrid working, travel allowance and compensation for your internet costs at home.
     * Holiday allowance and participation in a solid pension plan.
     * Working in a fast-growing company with a motivated international team with over 35 nationalities.
     * Having good equipment.
     * Having an influence on our products.
     * Working comfortably in a brand new office in Amsterdam with our company boat being only a stone's throw away.
     * Free quality lunches, snacks and drinks: whatever you fancy, our kitchen has it all!
     * Being able to participate in weekly bootcamp sessions or yoga classes.
     * Enjoying a weekly chair massage.
     * Chilled drinks on Friday.
     * Participating in our yearly week-long hackathon but also joining meet-ups, training courses and/or scientific conferences.
job_details.full_text:
Linux/Infra System Engineer

You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers, to:
     * Achieve uptime >99.99%.
     * Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters.
     * Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation.
     * Operate and improve our automation tooling.
     * Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
     * Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes.
     * Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide., * A fair salary.
     * A yearly bonus based on yours and the company's performance.
     * 25 days of holiday leave
     * Hybrid working, travel allowance and compensation for your internet costs at home.
     * Holiday allowance and participation in a solid pension plan.
     * Working in a fast-growing company with a motivated international team with over 35 nationalities.
     * Having good equipment.
     * Having an influence on our products.
     * Working comfortably in a brand new office in Amsterdam with our company boat being only a stone's throw away.
     * Free quality lunches, snacks and drinks: whatever you fancy, our kitchen has it all!
     * Being able to participate in weekly bootcamp sessions or yoga classes.
     * Enjoying a weekly chair massage.
     * Chilled drinks on Friday.
     * Participating in our yearly week-long hackathon but also joining meet-ups, training courses and/or scientific conferences.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on infrastructure management, system administration, and DevOps principles within a Linux/Infra environment. It does not mention any specific AI, ML, or GenAI technologies, models, or tasks, which are central to the ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it is a traditional IT/Infrastructure role, not directly related to AI development or application.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Operate and improve our automation tooling' and 'Work with a DevOps mindset', which are core components of operations engineering and MLOps, even though it's in an infrastructure context.
job_tasks.phrase: Operate and improve our automation tooling

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work with a DevOps mindset' directly aligns with the principles of Operations Engineering.
Providing 'a flexible infrastructure... up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes' implies development and maintenance of underlying software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes

job_tasks.justification: Achieving high uptime and managing infrastructure for corporate customers implies a need to understand business requirements and impact.
Understanding a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation is crucial for aligning infrastructure with business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation

soft_skills.phrase: Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company
Having an influence on our products
Participating in our yearly week-long hackathon but also joining meet-ups, training courses and/or scientific conferences
